name: 3D camera
description: Move the camera in 3D to view the layout from a different perspective.

actions.name: Look at position
actions.description: Orient the camera by setting the camera position and providing another position to point the camera towards.

params.name: Camera X
params.description: The X co-ordinate of the camera position.

params.name: Camera Y
params.description: The Y co-ordinate of the camera position.

params.name: Camera Z
params.description: The Z co-ordinate of the camera position.

params.name: Look at X
params.description: The X co-ordinate of the position to point the camera at.

params.name: Look at Y
params.description: The Y co-ordinate of the position to point the camera at.

params.name: Look at Z
params.description: The Z co-ordinate of the position to point the camera at.

params.name: Up vector X
params.description: The X component of a 3D vector indicating which way is up.

params.name: Up vector Y
params.description: The Y component of a 3D vector indicating which way is up.

params.name: Up vector Z
params.description: The Z component of a 3D vector indicating which way is up.

actions.name: Look parallel to layout
actions.description: A shortcut to orient the camera looking parallel to the layout as opposed to down on to the layout.
actions.display_text: Set camera parallel to layout at ([i]{0}[/i], [i]{1}[/i], [i]{2}[/i]) angle [i]{3}[/i]

params.name: Camera X
params.description: The X co-ordinate of the camera position.

params.name: Camera Y
params.description: The Y co-ordinate of the camera position.

params.name: Camera Z
params.description: The Z co-ordinate of the camera position.

params.name: Look angle
params.description: The angle in degrees to point the camera.

actions.name: Restore 2D camera
actions.description: Restore the default 2D camera behavior, centering on the scroll position.

actions.name: Move along layout axis
actions.description: Move the camera and/or look position along axes relative to the layout.

params.name: Distance
params.description: Number of units to move along the given axis.

params.name: Axis
params.description: Which axis, relative to the layout, to move along.

params.name: Which
params.description: Whether to move the camera, the look position, or both.

actions.name: Move along camera axis
actions.description: Move the camera and/or look position along axes relative to the direction the camera is pointing in.

params.name: Distance
params.description: Number of units to move along the given axis.

params.name: Axis
params.description: Which axis, relative to the direction the camera is pointing in, to move along.

params.name: Which
params.description: Whether to move the camera, the look position, or both.

actions.name: Set position
actions.description: Set the camera or look position.

params.name: Which
params.description: Whether to set the camera or the look position.

actions.name: Rotate camera
actions.description: Rotate the camera look direction by an X and Y amount. Useful for mouse look.
actions.display_text: Rotate camera by ([i]{0}[/i], [i]{1}[/i]), polar angle range [i]{2}[/i] to [i]{3}[/i]

params.name: Rotate X
params.description: Number of degrees to rotate horizontally.

params.name: Rotate Y
params.description: Number of degrees to rotate vertically.

params.name: Min polar angle
params.description: The minimum angle for Y rotation, limiting how far the camera can look upwards.

params.name: Max polar angle
params.description: The maximum angle for Y rotation, limiting how far the camera can look downwards.

actions.name: Set field of view
actions.description: Set the angle of the visible area in front of the camera. Only applicable with 'regular' Z axis scale.

params.name: Field of view
params.description: Angle of the field of view, in degrees.

expressions.name: CameraX
expressions.description: The X co-ordinate of the camera.

expressions.name: CameraY
expressions.description: The Y co-ordinate of the camera.

expressions.name: CameraZ
expressions.description: The Z co-ordinate of the camera.

expressions.name: LookX
expressions.description: The X co-ordinate of the position the camera is pointing at.

expressions.name: LookY
expressions.description: The Y co-ordinate of the position the camera is pointing at.

expressions.name: LookZ
expressions.description: The Z co-ordinate of the position the camera is pointing at.

expressions.name: UpX
expressions.description: The X component of the up vector.

expressions.name: UpY
expressions.description: The Y component of the up vector.

expressions.name: UpZ
expressions.description: The Z component of the up vector.

expressions.name: ForwardX
expressions.description: The X component of the forward unit vector.

expressions.name: ForwardY
expressions.description: The Y component of the forward unit vector.

expressions.name: ForwardZ
expressions.description: The Z component of the forward unit vector.

expressions.name: RightX
expressions.description: The X component of the right (perpendicular) unit vector.

expressions.name: RightY
expressions.description: The Y component of the right (perpendicular) unit vector.

expressions.name: RightZ
expressions.description: The Z component of the right (perpendicular) unit vector.

expressions.name: ViewportTopLeftX
expressions.description: Get the X co-ordinate of the top-left point of the visible area on a layer.

expressions.name: ViewportTopLeftY
expressions.description: Get the Y co-ordinate of the top-left point of the visible area on a layer.

expressions.name: ViewportTopRightX
expressions.description: Get the X co-ordinate of the top-right point of the visible area on a layer.

expressions.name: ViewportTopRightY
expressions.description: Get the Y co-ordinate of the top-right point of the visible area on a layer.

expressions.name: ViewportBottomRightX
expressions.description: Get the X co-ordinate of the bottom-right point of the visible area on a layer.

expressions.name: ViewportBottomRightY
expressions.description: Get the Y co-ordinate of the bottom-right point of the visible area on a layer.

expressions.name: ViewportBottomLeftX
expressions.description: Get the X co-ordinate of the bottom-left point of the visible area on a layer.

expressions.name: ViewportBottomLeftY
expressions.description: Get the Y co-ordinate of the bottom-left point of the visible area on a layer.

expressions.name: LayerToCanvasX
expressions.description: Translate a 3D position from layer co-ordinates to canvas CSS co-ordinates.

expressions.name: LayerToCanvasY
expressions.description: Translate a 3D position from layer co-ordinates to canvas CSS co-ordinates.

expressions.name: CanvasToLayerX
expressions.description: Translate a position from canvas CSS co-ordinates to layer co-ordinates on a Z plane.

expressions.name: CanvasToLayerY
expressions.description: Translate a position from canvas CSS co-ordinates to layer co-ordinates on a Z plane.

expressions.name: CameraXRotation
expressions.description: The X rotation of the camera in degrees.

expressions.name: CameraYRotation
expressions.description: The Y rotation of the camera in degrees.

expressions.name: ZScale
expressions.description: The scale factor for number of pixels per unit on the Z axis.

expressions.name: DefaultCameraZ
expressions.description: The camera Z position where a 2D view will display at 100% scale.

expressions.name: LayerToLayerX
expressions.description: Translate a 3D position from one layer to another layer.

expressions.name: LayerToLayerY
expressions.description: Translate a 3D position from one layer to another layer.

expressions.name: LookVectorX
expressions.description: The X component of the vector from the camera to look position.

expressions.name: LookVectorY
expressions.description: The Y component of the vector from the camera to look position.

expressions.name: LookVectorZ
expressions.description: The Z component of the vector from the camera to look position.

expressions.name: FieldOfView
expressions.description: The current field of view in degrees.
